body.p: A Kentucky hat merchant and politician. Married to Nancy Shaw. Father of Joshua Shaw, Agnes Shaw, Joseph M. Shaw, Jane S. Shaw, Kate M. Shaw, and Theo M. Shaw. Member of the Whig Party and Republican Party. Partner with Nathaniel Shaw at the firm of N. & H. Shaw in Lexington, Kentucky from 1834 to 1849. Continued as a hat merchant with own firm following the death of Nathaniel. Served as a member of the Union Executive Committee of Kentucky in 1865.
